CustomField.description: Combines name of all children. Used for pop-up alerts on Americord Client Service App (Lighnting).
CustomField.formula: If (NOT(ISBLANK( Baby_C_Name_of_Child__c)), "Triplets: "& Name_of_Child__c&", "&Baby_B_Name_of_Child__c&" & "&Baby_C_Name_of_Child__c &" - "& Text(MONTH(Birth_Date_from_Courier__c))&"/"&Text(DAY(Birth_Date_from_Courier__c))&"/"&Text(YEAR(Birth_Date_from_Courier__c)) , IF (AND (ISBLANK(Baby_C_Name_of_Child__c), NOT(ISBLANK( Baby_B_Name_of_Child__c))), "Twins: "&Name_of_Child__c&" & " &Baby_B_Name_of_Child__c&" - "& Text(MONTH(Birth_Date_from_Courier__c))&"/"&Text(DAY(Birth_Date_from_Courier__c))&"/"&Text(YEAR(Birth_Date_from_Courier__c)), IF (AND (ISBLANK(Baby_C_Name_of_Child__c), ISBLANK( Baby_B_Name_of_Child__c), NOT(ISBLANK( Name_of_Child__c))), "Child: "&Name_of_Child__c&" - "& Text(MONTH(Birth_Date_from_Courier__c))&"/"&Text(DAY(Birth_Date_from_Courier__c))&"/"&Text(YEAR(Birth_Date_from_Courier__c)), "")))
CustomField.label: Children's Name
